name: answer_id
description: Unique identifier for the answer.

name: author
description: Name of the author.

name: author_bot
description: Indicates whether the author is a bot.

name: author_gender
description: Gender of the author.

name: author_gender_acc
description: Accuracy or confidence level for the author's gender identification.

name: author_id
description: Unique identifier for the author.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of multiple organization names associated with the author.

name: author_name
description: Full name of the author.

name: author_org_name
description: Organization name associated with the author.

name: author_user_name
description: Username of the author.

name: author_uuid
description: Unique UUID for the author.

name: content
description: Content of the post or answer as a single string.

name: content_analyzed
description: Content of the post or answer, analyzed for searching.

name: creation_date
description: Date when the content was created.

name: creator_bot
description: Indicates whether the creator is a bot.

name: creator_gender
description: Gender of the creator.

name: creator_gender_acc
description: Accuracy or confidence level for the creator's gender identification.

name: creator_id
description: Unique identifier for the creator.

name: creator_multi_org_names
description: List of multiple organization names associated with the creator.

name: creator_name
description: Full name of the creator.

name: creator_org_name
description: Organization name associated with the creator.

name: creator_user_name
description: Username of the creator.

name: creator_uuid
description: Unique UUID for the creator.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Date when the item was created upstream, typically the date the question or answer was created.

name: helpful_answer
description: Field indicating whether the answer was marked as helpful.

name: id
description: Unique identifier for the entity (question or answer).

name: is_kitsune_answer
description: Field containing '1' if the item is a Kitsune answer.

name: is_kitsune_question
description: Field containing '1' if the item is a Kitsune question.

name: is_kitsune_question_solved
description: Field containing '1' if the Kitsune question is marked as solved.

name: is_spam
description: Field indicating whether the content is flagged as spam.

name: last_activity_date
description: Date when the last activity occurred on the item (question or answer).

name: lifetime_days
description: The total lifetime of the question or answer in days.

name: locale
description: Locale or language in which the content was written.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Timestamp when the item was indexed.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: num_answers
description: Number of answers associated with the question.

name: offset
description: Offset of the document in the data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the data was retrieved from.

name: product
description: Product associated with the question or answer.

name: project
description: Project name associated with the question or answer.

name: project_1
description: Additional project information if multiple project levels exist.

name: question_id
description: Unique identifier for the question.

name: score
description: Score or rating given to the question or answer.

name: solution
description: Field indicating whether the answer is marked as a solution.

name: status
description: Status of the question or answer (open, archived, locked, solved).

name: tag
description: Tag associated with the origin.

name: tags
description: List of tags associated with the question or answer.

name: tags_analyzed
description: Tags analyzed for searching.

name: time_to_first_reply_hours
description: Time taken to receive the first reply, measured in hours.

name: title
description: Title of the question or answer.

name: type
description: Type of content (e.g., question, answer).

name: unhelpful_answer
description: Field indicating whether the answer was marked as unhelpful.

name: url
description: URL corresponding to the question or answer.

name: uuid
description: Unique identifier (UUID) for the entity.
